content:
Hi, I have a question about the module behavior of Rustc. I prepared an example at the following link. Could you please tell me why the E1 & E2 have different errors? Is this the expected behavior? It seems the error of E2 is smarter than E1.
https://wandbox.org/permlink/o7eRATQXpwD1KX2g
In case of E1 you can use it, but not re-export it as public using pub use. In case of E2 you can't use it in the first place.
